name: swissfolio
title: Swissfolio
desc: A modern Astro and Tailwind CSS template for your your links, information, projects, and more.
article:
The template includes:

Thank you so much for reading and showing interest on this template, if you need more templates, a bundle that includes other templates, free updates is also offered on Lexington Themes.

Discover the adaptability of Lexington's multipage themes, each equipped with a dynamic MDX Blog and flexible sections for effortless customization. Offering the freedom to uniquely tailor your site, all our themes ensure you're up and running in hours, not days.
